articles.title: Mysterious fast radio burst in space has a 'heartbeat' pattern - CNN
articles.description: A mysterious radio burst with a pattern similar to a heartbeat has been detected about a billion light-years away. The signal is the longest-lasting fast radio burst to date and could be caused by a distant neutron star.
